original: Öm, Ragnar Vilhelm, disponent, Påskallavik, f. 15/6/01 i Köla, Värml. 1., av konsul G. O. o. Josefine Örn. G. 29 m. Barbara Boddy. Barn: Ste-phan f. 31, Monica 33. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 22, stud. i Tyskl. o. Frankr. 22, 23’. Kadett v. KAI 23-26, anst. v. agen-turer i London 27-29, avd :chef h. Nil-sen & Co. Ltd A-B i Sthlm 29-32, anst. v. ag. i London 3’3-34, försäljn :chef f. A-B EmsfoTs Bruk 34-38, disp. där fr. 38, verkst. dir. där fr. 47. Styr:led. i A-B Emsfors Bruk.
translated: Öm, Ragnar Vilhelm, manager, Påskallavik, b. 15/6/01 in Köla, Värmland. Firstborn of consul G. O. and Josefine Örn. Married on 29 to Barbara Boddy. Children: Stephan b. 31, Monica b. 33. Graduated from Stockholm High School in 22, studied in Germany and France in 22, 23. Cadet at Kungliga Artilleri- och Ingenjörsskolan from 23 to 26, employed by agencies in London from 27 to 29, department manager at Nilsen & Co Ltd AB in Stockholm from 29 to 32, employed by agencies in London from 33 to 34, sales manager at AB Emsfors Bruk from 34 to 38, became manager from 38, and executive director from 47. Board member of AB Emsfors Bruk.
